item.title: ðŸ“Œ Thoughts
item.description: [03.02] No people, no profit Musk keeps talking about declining birth rates and the urgency for humans to have more babies, yet he never talked about the why part. He is silent over the cause of the problem. High cost of living, long working hours, and unhealthy lifestyles are pushing people to their limits. Essentially the capitalists are squeezing everything out of the working class. He doesn’t even care this issue for his own employees as they have to sacrifice their family time to work their ass off for him or they get fired.
